StateMachineElement.Name: PresentStimulus

ChangeRingColor
StateMachineElement.Script: if(RightGraphic.visible) FeedbackRing.setColor( RightGraphic.red, RightGraphic.green, RightGraphic.blue); else FeedbackRing.setColor( LeftGraphic.red, LeftGraphic.green, LeftGraphic.blue); return true;
